Text.Page:
Count on the Mysterium to demand military supportâ€”and then ignore our advice. I warned them the kumases are too dangerous to study up close, but they just won't listen.

Specifically, Siria won't. She's ambitious and brave, but what good is that if she's dead? Think you can back her up? I think you're just what she needs.

I've got a note for {@LinkCreature:207#1009#Siria}. See that she gets it, will you?

Yes, yes, I heard Heroth's warning quite well. My research won't be solved from the safety of a camp. I've got to get out in the field if I'm going to make my mark!

So, thank you for passing along his note. Now, I have work to do.
